scripts.test:coverage: turbo run test -- --coverage && pnpm merge-coverage && pnpm report-coverage
scripts.merge-coverage: rimraf coverage/merged && mkdir -p coverage/merged && find packages apps -name 'coverage' -type d -exec sh -c 'test -f "$1/coverage-final.json" && echo "$1"' _ {} \; | xargs -I {} sh -c 'cp {}/coverage-final.json coverage/merged/$(echo {} | tr / -).json' || true
scripts.publish-packages: turbo run build lint test && changeset version && changeset publish
